bill.title: Local Tax Referenda Requirements
bill.description: Requiring a referendum to reenact an expiring tourist development tax or tourist impact tax, respectively, to be held at the general election immediately preceding the expiration date of the tax; requiring a referendum to approve a millage rate increase for a children's services independent special district property tax to be held at the general election immediately preceding the effective date of the increase; requiring a referendum to reenact an expiring local government discretionary sales surtax to be held at the general election immediately preceding the expiration date of the surtax; deleting provisions that authorize school district millage elections to be held at any time and specify a limit on such elections, etc.

history.action: Referred to Community Affairs; Finance and Tax; Fiscal Policy
